Saturday the 25th of August we are getting together as a general hello to the local users of the group.

== Agenda ==

MatthewCopple will be demonstrating synchronization from a Palm Treo to Linux.  The latest Ubuntu Tribe of Gutsy Gibbon will be available to look through.

== Afterthoughts ==

After the meeting we will adjourn to a local restaurant for dinner and continuing discussions of the group.  Pictures and notes will be added to this page after the meeting.
